name: 王鴻祥
objective:
本課程幫助學生透過企業見習,在真實的專案中體驗產品開發流程,以增進
學生創業心態與團隊合作的問題解決能力。選修本課程的學生必須已先修畢一門專題相關課程（如專題設計、實務專題），且有義務完成120小時的企業見習。
This course is to help students, as apprentices or trainees, experience product
develop processes in real projects to enhance their entrepreneurial mindset and
skills of problem-solving in teamwork. The prerequisite/pre-work course is at least one-semester special project related course. Students are obligated to complete a 120-hour program of apprentices or trainees.
